parameters.query:
-- –ò—â–µ–º session_id –ø–æ email –≤ user_contact_data –∏ prechat_submissions
SELECT DISTINCT session_id, email, 'user_contact_data' as source
FROM user_contact_data
WHERE LOWER(email) = LOWER('{{ $json.email }}')

UNION

SELECT DISTINCT session_id, email, 'prechat_submissions' as source
FROM prechat_submissions
WHERE LOWER(email) = LOWER('{{ $json.email }}');

SELECT 
    id,
    session_id,
    action,
    details,
    ip_address,
    user_agent,
    domain,
    created_at,
    purpose,
    legal_basis,
    controller,
    data_categories,
    privacy_policy_version
FROM gdpr_audit_log
WHERE session_id IN ({{ $json.session_ids_sql }})
ORDER BY created_at ASC;

SELECT 
    session_id,
    user_email,
    consent_given,
    consent_type,
    privacy_policy_version,
    is_active,
    revoked_at,
    revoke_reason,
    created_at,
    expires_at,
    domain
FROM gdpr_consents
WHERE session_id IN ({{ $('Prepare SQL Query').first().json.session_ids_sql }})
ORDER BY created_at ASC;

-- –ü–æ–ª—É—á–∞–µ–º email –∏ –∏–º—è —Å –ø—Ä–∏–æ—Ä–∏—Ç–µ—Ç–æ–º: prechat_submissions ‚Üí user_contact_data
SELECT DISTINCT ON (session_id)
    session_id,
    email,
    name,
    source,
    created_at
FROM (
    -- –ü—Ä–∏–æ—Ä–∏—Ç–µ—Ç 1: prechat_submissions
    SELECT 
        session_id, 
        email, 
        name,
        'prechat_submissions' as source,
        1 as priority,
        created_at
    FROM prechat_submissions
    WHERE session_id IN ({{ $('Prepare SQL Query').first().json.session_ids_sql }})
    AND (email IS NOT NULL AND email != '')

    UNION ALL

    -- –ü—Ä–∏–æ—Ä–∏—Ç–µ—Ç 2: user_contact_data (fallback)
    SELECT 
        session_id, 
        email, 
        COALESCE(full_name, CONCAT_WS(' ', first_name, last_name)) as name,
        'user_contact_data' as source,
        2 as priority,
        created_at
    FROM user_contact_data
    WHERE session_id IN ({{ $('Prepare SQL Query').first().json.session_ids_sql }})
    AND (email IS NOT NULL AND email != '')
) combined
ORDER BY session_id, priority, created_at DESC;

parameters.jsCode:
// –ì–µ–Ω–µ—Ä–∏—Ä—É–µ–º HTML –¥–ª—è PDF const reportData = items[0].json; const report = reportData.report; const hasData = report.processingActivities && report.processingActivities.length > 0; const noDataMessage = report.message || 'No records found for the specified criteria'; // –ò–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏—è –æ —Å—É–±—ä–µ–∫—Ç–µ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö const dataSubject = report.dataSubjectInformation || {}; const primaryEmail = dataSubject.email || report.dataSubjectSummary?.email || 'N/A'; const primaryName = dataSubject.name || report.dataSubjectSummary?.name || ''; const sessionIds = dataSubject.sessionIds || report.reportMetadata?.queryParameters?.sessionIds || []; const html = ` GDPR Audit Report

GDPR Article 30 Compliance Report

Record of Processing Activities - Data Subject Audit

Report Generated: ${report.reportMetadata?.generatedAt || new Date().toISOString()}
Search Method: ${report.reportMetadata?.queryParameters?.searchedBy === 'email' ? 'Email' : 'Session ID'}
Controller: ${report.controllerInformation?.name || 'N/A'}
Domain: ${report.controllerInformation?.domain || 'N/A'}

üë§ Data Subject Information

Email: ${primaryEmail}
Name: ${primaryName || 'N/A'}
Session ID: ${sessionIds.join(', ') || 'N/A'}
Total Sessions: ${sessionIds.length || 1}
Data Sources: ${[...new Set((dataSubject.emailSources || []).map(s => s.source))].join(', ') || 'N/A'}
${!hasData ? `

‚ö†Ô∏è No Data Found

${noDataMessage}

` : `

Summary Statistics

${report.dataSubjectSummary?.totalAuditRecords || 0}
Total Processing Activities
${report.dataSubjectSummary?.totalConsentRecords || 0}
Consent Records
${report.dataSubjectSummary?.dataCategories?.length || 0}
Data Categories
Activity Period: ${report.dataSubjectSummary?.firstActivity || 'N/A'} ‚Äî ${report.dataSubjectSummary?.lastActivity || 'N/A'}

Legal Basis & Data Categories

Legal Basis: ${report.legalBasis?.primaryBasis || 'Consent'}

Processing Purposes: ${report.legalBasis?.purposes?.join(', ') || 'N/A'}

Data Categories Processed: ${report.dataSubjectSummary?.dataCategories?.join(', ') || 'None'}

Processing Activities Log

${(report.processingActivities || []).map(act => ` `).join('')}
Timestamp Session Action GDPR Article Purpose Details
${act.timestamp ? new Date(act.timestamp).toLocaleString('en-GB') : 'N/A'} ${(act.sessionId || '').slice(-12)} ${(act.action || '').replace(/_/g, ' ')} ${act.gdprArticle || '-'} ${act.purpose || '-'} ${act.actionDescription || '-'}
IP: ${act.technicalInfo?.ipAddress || 'N/A'}
${report.consentHistory && report.consentHistory.length > 0 ? `

Consent History

${report.consentHistory.map(c => ` `).join('')}
Date Email Name Type Status Revoked
${c.createdAt ? new Date(c.createdAt).toLocaleString('en-GB') : 'N/A'} ${c.email || primaryEmail || '-'} ${c.name || primaryName || '-'} ${c.consentType || '-'} ${c.isActive ? 'Active' : 'Inactive'} ${c.revokedAt ? new Date(c.revokedAt).toLocaleString('en-GB') : '-'}
` : ''} `}

Compliance Statement

${report.complianceStatement?.declaration || 'This report is generated in accordance with GDPR Article 30 requirements.'}

Data Protection Measures

    ${(report.complianceStatement?.dataProtectionMeasures || []).map(m => `
  • ${m}
    • `).join('')}

Data Subject Rights

    ${(report.complianceStatement?.dataSubjectRights || []).map(r => `
  • ${r}
    • `).join('')}

Report ID: GDPR-${Date.now()}

Generated by: ${report.reportMetadata?.generatedBy || 'GDPR Compliance System'}

Data Subject: ${primaryEmail} ${primaryName ? '(' + primaryName + ')' : ''}

Contact DPO: ${report.controllerInformation?.contactDpo || 'N/A'}

This document constitutes an official record of processing activities in accordance with GDPR Article 30.

`; return [{ json: { success: true, format: 'pdf', filename: `gdpr_audit_report_${new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0]}.html`, content: html, contentType: 'text/html', totalRecords: reportData.totalRecords || 0 } }];
